Interface Option.Action<T>

  • Enclosing class:
    Option<T>

    public static interface Option.Action<T>
    Callback functional interface for matched options.

      void set(CommandLine commandLine, Option<T> option, String value)

        void set(CommandLine commandLine,
         Option<T> option,
         String value)
  throws Exception
        Perform some action, being passed the value and the CommandLine.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - The state-holding CommandLine object.
        option - The matched option.
        value - The value to the option, if any. Possibly null.
        Throws:
        if - an error occurs
